name: Dragon
tuts:
• Realms enchant (1.4)
1) Enchant item
2) Place in crafting table
3) Exit table.
• Realms give (1.4)
1) Open player category
2) Choose <set offhand>
3) Give the item
4) Put offhand item in hotbar.
• Bypass IP ban
1) Search VPN in playstore
2) Choose most downloaded
3) Turn it on.
• Bypass device ban
1) MCPE storage to external
2) Open other category
3) Tap delete CID.
• Vote more daily
1) Search VPN in playstore
2) Choose most downloaded
3) Turn it on
4) Vote with random name
5) Change device date
6) Change VPN region
7) Repeat to vote more.
• Delete PG chests
1) Use bucket of water
2) Place water on same block
the chest is on/under chest
3) Pick up chest & water.
• Get inside HCF bases
1) Open world category
2) Choose nullify doors/gates
3) Walk through gates.
news: Enjoy dragon beta! 1.5 will be coming soon.
info:
Dragon is a mod for MCPE 1.4.+
It is mainly meant for servers & realms so some features will not be added.
Dragons design is customizable in settings.
Bypasses will be coming soon.
Dragon is based off alphahack & MCPC clients.
MCPC design coming soon.
We plan to make dragon the best there is.
